name: Driving Skill 3D - Car SIM
description:
Driving Skill 3D - Car SIM is an amazing car parking simulator game that requires highest precision! Car and driving game enthusiasts, get your crazy driving skills honed like the blade of a knife in Game. Avoid cones along the roadside that are within your view and position the cars inside the checkpoints.
* realistic driving simulator
* complete 48 challenging driving exercises
* enjoy the realistic on-screen controls
* change the angle of your camera if you prefer other views to play
